segments.script_part: AOC just claimed ninety-five percent of companies investing in AI are getting zero returns. Sounds like a bubble ready to burst, right?
segments.image_prompt: Hooded figure with single eye examining a large glowing bubble containing AI chip symbols and dollar signs with 95% statistic floating inside, character's hand reaching toward the bubble as if testing its fragility, warning symbols and red alert indicators surrounding the scene, character fully integrated and analyzing the bubble's structural integrity, aspect ratio 9:16, style: black and white vector graphic

segments.script_part: But here's what Wall Street isn't telling you. Every transformative technology looks like this early on. The internet in nineteen ninety-six. Cloud computing in two thousand eight.
segments.image_prompt: Hooded figure with single eye standing on timeline showing three technology waves: 1996 internet bubble with old computer monitors, 2008 cloud computing with server icons, and 2025 AI wave with neural network symbols, character pointing at pattern similarities across all three eras, historical comparison visualization with character as guide through tech cycles, aspect ratio 9:16, style: black and white vector graphic

segments.script_part: Zero ROI at first, then explosive growth. The study she cited measured immediate returns, not long-term infrastructure value.
segments.image_prompt: Hooded figure with single eye holding magnifying glass over two contrasting charts: left shows flat zero ROI line in red, right shows exponential growth curve in green, character analyzing the gap between short-term measurement and long-term reality, infrastructure building blocks appearing beneath the growth curve, aspect ratio 9:16, style: black and white vector graphic

segments.script_part: Companies aren't buying AI for quick profits—they're building competitive moats. Nvidia's fifty-seven billion in quarterly revenue didn't come from speculation.
segments.image_prompt: Hooded figure with single eye constructing a protective fortress wall labeled 'competitive moat' with AI building blocks, NVDA logo prominently displayed with $57B revenue figure glowing in green, character actively placing infrastructure pieces to show strategic long-term building rather than speculation, aspect ratio 9:16, style: black and white vector graphic

segments.script_part: It came from real enterprise demand. Microsoft, Google, Amazon—they're betting hundreds of billions because they've seen the adoption curves.
segments.image_prompt: Hooded figure with single eye observing three massive tech company logos (MSFT, GOOG, AMZN) with upward trending adoption curve graphs flowing from each, character tracing the curve pattern with finger showing exponential enterprise adoption trajectory, hundreds of billions in investment capital flowing as visual streams toward AI infrastructure, aspect ratio 9:16, style: black and white vector graphic

segments.script_part: The real risk isn't the AI bubble popping. It's missing the next decade of growth because you confused early-stage investment with failure.
segments.image_prompt: Hooded figure with single eye standing at crossroads with two paths: left path shows small deflating bubble labeled 'short-term thinking' in red, right path shows expanding growth trajectory labeled '10-year opportunity' in green, character pointing decisively toward the growth path, early-stage investment foundation blocks visible on correct path, aspect ratio 9:16, style: black and white vector graphic

segments.script_part: Smart money doesn't chase hype. It recognizes infrastructure builds before they pay off. The question isn't if AI delivers returns. It's whether you understand the timeline.
segments.image_prompt: Hooded figure with single eye holding hourglass showing extended timeline, infrastructure foundation being built in lower half while returns appear in upper half with delay visualization, character's other hand gesturing toward patient capital concept, smart money symbols flowing toward long-term infrastructure rather than hype bubbles, aspect ratio 9:16, style: black and white vector graphic
